keyword: how many calories are in dum dum pops
title: How Many Calories Are in Dum Dum Pops?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Dum Dum Pops, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition per lollipop for quick candy facts.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Dum Dum Pops?
assumptions: Standard Dum Dum lollipop (hard candy on stick), one pop (~5 g), cherry or similar flavor, no wrappers or sticks weighed.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and manufacturer; values are approximate. Check packaging for exact details.

quick_answer.text: One Dum Dum Pop contains about 25 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Two Dum Dum Pops instead of one
Mystery flavor variation (slightly different sugar content)

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Dum Dum Pop?
Are Dum Dum Pops low carb?
faqs.a: Each pop has 6 g carbs, all from sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Do Dum Dum Pops have fat or protein?
faqs.a: No fat or protein; they're pure sugar candy.

faqs.q: How many calories in a pack of Dum Dum Pops?
faqs.a: A standard 40-count bag is about 1,000 calories total (25 kcal each).

faqs.q: What's the sodium in Dum Dum Pops?
faqs.a: Typically 0 mg per pop, as they're unflavored beyond sugar.
